com.example.habitup.Controller

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.habitup.Controller.ElasticSearchController

  • public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    ElasticSearchController performs all ElasticSearch-related operations, primarily establishing connections with the database and performing queries. Some of these queries will have to be updated to override the default 10 results cap - those key to P4 implementation have this done already, but others (e.g. GetAllUsersTask) will need to be updated for P5.
    Author:
    tyheise, gojeffcho Javadoc last updated 2017-11-13 by @gojeffcho

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ElasticSearchController.AddAttrsTask
      Put Attributes object to the DB - done by UID, so can be add or edit .execute() with Attributes object
      static class  ElasticSearchController.AddHabitEventsTask
      Add HabitEvent - NOT by EID.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.AddHabitsTask
      Put a Habit to the DB - done by HID, so can be add or edit task .execute() with Habit object
      static class  ElasticSearchController.AddUsersTask
      Put a UserAccount to the DB - by UID, so can be an add or edit operation .execute() with UserAccount object
      static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteHabitEventTask
      Delete a HabitEvent by EID .execute() using String EID
      static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteHabitTask
      Delete Habit by HID .execute() using String HID
      static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteUserTask
      Delete a UserAccount by UID .execute() using String UID
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetAllUsers
      Gets all UserAccounts, up to NUM_OF_ES_RESULTS .execute() with no args .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetAttributesTask
      Gets Attributes object belonging to the UID .execute() with String UID .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitEventsByEIDTask
      Retrieve a HabitEvent by EID.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitEventsByHidTask
      Get all HabitEvents belonging to a HID .execute() using String HID .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitEventsByUidTask
      Get all HabitEvents belonging to a UserAccount by UID.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitEventsForCommentMatch
      Gets HabitEvents for the CurrentUser that match a comment search string .execute() using String to match comments by .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitEventsForDelete
      Get HabitEvents specifically for deletion - returns a larger number of HabitEvents to make sure they all get deleted properly.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitsByNameForCurrentUserTask
      Gets Habits matching a name for the CurrentUser .execute() using String of HabitName .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetHabitsTask
      Gets the Habit corresponding to an HID .execute() with String HID .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetMaxHidTask
      Gets the highest HID currently in use, then returns its increment.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetMaxUidTask
      Gets the highest UID currently in use, then returns its increment .execute() .get() -> Integer (next available UID to use)
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetUser
      Get a UserAccount object corresponding to a String username .execute() with a String (username) .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetUserHabitsTask
      Get all Habits belonging to a UserAccount .execute() with String UID .get() -> ArrayList
      static class  ElasticSearchController.UpdateUsersTask
      This is the main task used to update a user in the elastic search server.
